ModMetaData.name: WVC Core Elite Bionics Framework Patch
ModMetaData.author: ChakMlaxpin
ModMetaData.description:
A small patch to give the HP modifiers to the bionics added in WVC Core.
The HP modifiers for the different tiers of bionics added by WVC Core are as follows:
- Torture +20% - Experimental +30% - Cybernetic +35% - Ancient +40% - Mechanoid +60% - Green, red, violet and yellow nodes +75% - Blue node +90% - Archotech +100%
This is my first mod and I'd like to give a big thank you to Owlchemist for helping me figure out the stuff I'd managed to miss that was stopping this mod from working.
